DOC.brief_summary: This study assess effectiveness new pelvic floor exercise device strengthen pelvic floor muscle treat urinary incontinence among woman experience symptom pelvic floor weakness . The study conduct 12 week result collect self-assessment questionnaire clinical pelvic examination . Effectiveness outcomes track duration trial measure historical symptom .
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Kegel Exercise Device Strengthening Pelvic Floor Treating Urinary Incontinence ( UI )
DOC.detailed_description: The objective study test device woman experience symptom pelvic floor weakness , namely urinary incontinence , vaginal laxity sexual sensation problem , assess change pelvic floor muscle strength , intervention . The study device pelvic floor exercise device provide biofeedback exercise guidance . Women meet inclusion criterion recruit regular patient investigation site give device use home daily 12 week . Subjects submit information regard experience device self-assessed improvement symptom . A pelvic examination conduct start conclusion study measure pelvic floor muscle strength reading . The research hypothesis strength level , subjective assessment vaginal tightness sexual sensation great end study baseline mean value frequency volume bladder leak less baseline .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject provide write informed consent HIPAA authorization study procedure conduct ; 2 . Experience urinary incontinence and/or vaginal laxity and/or decrease sexual sensation period 6 week . 1 . Subject condition exhibit behavior indicate Principal Investigator Subject unlikely compliant study procedures visit 2 . Has prior surgery incontinence , prolapse vaginal tightening 3 . Has diagnose pelvic organ prolapse severe grade 2 4 . Suffers vaginal penetration difficulty 5 . Has 3 urinary tract infection past 12 month 6 . Has condition bladder effect continence 7 . Suffer vaginal/vulvar/pelvic pain 8 . Is currently take medication incontinence 9 . Is pregnant try become pregnant 10 . Has give birth less 6 week prior enrollment 11 . Has diagnose obese BMI > 30 12 . Is heavy smoker > 20 cigarette per day 13 . Has history neurological condition Parkinson 's , multiple sclerosis 14 . Suffers chronic constipation
